questions.questionText: How do you feel at a large social gathering?

C.text: Neutral, I can go either way

questions.questionText: How do you prefer to spend your weekend?

A.text: Going out with friends to a party

B.text: Relaxing at home with a book or a movie

C.text: Meeting a small group of close friends

D.text: Spending time on a solitary hobby

questions.questionText: How do you approach new people?

A.text: I enjoy meeting and talking to new people

B.text: I prefer waiting for others to approach me

C.text: I feel nervous but manage to engage

D.text: I avoid meeting new people whenever possible

questions.questionText: In a group project, what role do you usually take?

A.text: I naturally take the lead and organize the group

B.text: I contribute ideas but avoid taking the lead

C.text: I prefer doing the work on my own

D.text: I participate but let others take the initiative

extrovert.message: You are more extroverted! You enjoy social interactions, feel energized by being around others, and are likely to be outgoing.

introvert.message: You are more introverted! You prefer solitude, feel drained by social interactions, and enjoy deep thinking and meaningful conversations.

neutral.message: You have a balanced personality! You enjoy both social interactions and time alone, adapting to different environments based on your mood or the situation.
